website_summaries.verdict: Roomy and stylish polyester backpack. Features fold-over top and zippered shoe compartment.
pros: Large main compartment along with multiple accessory pockets keep items organized
A mesh side pocket offers breathable storage

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a work/gym bag and this gets the job done. I was tired of carrying my laptop bag in addition to my gym duffle bag. This gym bag is a little more discreet and doesn't look as out of place in the office. I carry in it my laptop with cables/mouse, shoes, gym clothes, wrist wraps, shaker bottle, and my lunch. It is a little annoying going through so many steps to open it but it's not a big deal. The straps are comfortable and it looks stylish. There is a mesh pocket on the outside that is perfect for holding an umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, elegant but not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I like the style, works well as a gym bag and for travel. The fabric part is very sturdy and high quality and I have received compliments for it. However after a year of irregular use at the gym, the vinyl-like material on the lower half of the bag has suffered a lot of wear and the logo has rubbed off. It looks crinkled and water-damaged, which is a shame because the rest is holding up well. The velcro opening is also more problematic than I had initially realized: it catches on clothing when putting stuff in and taking out.
customer_reviews.author: Person of Interest

customer_reviews.title: The shoe compartment at the bottom is very nice to keep shoes away from your clothes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my wife who works out at the gym several times a week and transports lots of stuff. This bag is well built and has many compartments. The shoe compartment at the bottom is very nice to keep shoes away from your clothes. Would recommend this product for anyone who works out at a gym several times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Draz

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack. I'm a girl using this and don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. I'm a girl using this and don't find it big at all. In fact, I wish there was even more room in the shoe compartment to fit all the gym clothes. One gripe is the outer pocket with zipper doesn't stay secure all the way and is prone to unzipping. Second issue is that it doesn't seem like it will hold up as well as other bags in this price point, the seams near the bottom are already kind of sagging. It will fit a 15.6 laptop, but not larger (in the laptop pouch)
customer_reviews.author: LiztheBiz

customer_reviews.title: Terrific for car-less commute
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this bag for walking & biking commuting for a few months now. Finally satisfied with a bag that is water resistant, but stylish. I can now carry my gym clothes, lunchbox, and daily use items with ease. Love the space & pockets. Have worn it in the rain this spring and all of my items remained dry. Only improvements would be: higher quality zippers & addition of chest & waist stabilizing straps.
customer_reviews.author: Katie B Corwin

customer_reviews.title: Useful backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good backpack for someone who wants their shoes or other items to be stored in a separate compartment. I really enjoy how it fills up vertically as opposed​ to horizontally like most backpacks. It is good enough for a long weekend or just going to the track after work.
customer_reviews.author: taiowa waner

customer_reviews.title: Three things i don't like: - Front pouch in not water proof
customer_reviews.text: This is my work/gym bag. Really organizes everything well. Three things i don't like: - Front pouch in not water proof. - Bottom compartment is shared, which means if you put something in the bottom compartment last, you have to push the main compartment contents upward. - Needs one more pocket for quick access. Overall this bag is a huge improvement for me, especially for spending nights out at the ladies place in NYC.
customer_reviews.author: PBandZelly

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable AND Functional!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag, could not more highly recommended. It looks great, exactly as pictured. It has a slim profile, which is especially great for commuting. You can fit endless amounts of stuff inside the bag, and it still feels like a feather when worn. The front pocket is perfectly accessible, as is the water bottle pocket. The interior laptop sleeve fits even my 17" laptop with case easily. Very highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking backpack but limited use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gym backpack but not a good computer backpack with a lot of pockets. If you want a nice looking back to go to the gym with and you don't want a lot of pockets then get it! But you want a lot of pockets for multiple things then NOT get this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tman31

customer_reviews.title: Which it wasn’t that pricey though
customer_reviews.text: Fashionably spacious. Lots of room, but not a lot of pockets. I comfortable store basketball shoes, running shoes, a pump, basketball, battery charger, headphones, and extra clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for holding my laptop and work documents while at ...
customer_reviews.text: the over all size is bigger than i expected, but it doesn't necessarily bother me. It is perfect for holding my laptop and work documents while at the same time having the space for my gym clothes and shoes. I wanted to do away with my computer case that carries all my pens, books, hardware, and cables, and this bag almost allows me to do that, but I do wish it had a bit more compartments and pockets. I make it work though.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Sommers

customer_reviews.title: Great transition - from the office to the gym
customer_reviews.text: Great gym bag! The shoe compartment was a great size to fit my running shoes. The design of the bag is sporty and unique, but still professional looking enough to bring to work. Its a great transition bag from the office to the gym. The size of the top side flaps were a little awkward to get used to at first, but I would highly recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla

customer_reviews.title: Great Pack!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our high school freshman. What a great pack. Our freshman wanted it because it looks good, but there is a ton of room in the pack. He usually packs all his books, lunch and a skateboard helmet.
customer_reviews.author: BJB

customer_reviews.title: Beware - you don't get the bag pictured!!
customer_reviews.text: We received a cheap Nike string bag instead of what's pictured! It was a Christmas gift so now we get to go through the hassle of returning it. I will NOT pay $80 for a string bag.
customer_reviews.author: EC_Tjaden

customer_reviews.title: This bag is awesome! It's definitely bigger than I thought but I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome! It's definitely bigger than I thought but I'm happy about that. I'm a powerlifter and I needed a bag that I could comfortably carry my weight belt, knee sleeves, oly shoes, mobility tools, gym clothes, make up bag, wallet and shaker bottles in and this is the perfect bag if you don't want a duffle bag and want more organization. I'll deff be using this as a travel bag too
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not a good gym bag
customer_reviews.text: The shoe compartment is not vented at all. Which means if you leave your gym shoes in the bag the next time you put them on they'll still be moist. So you have to take your shoes out and put them back in each time you go to the gym. This is not a great gym bag. It looks sexy though
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Gave to my son for his birthday. He loves ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my son for his birthday. He loves it and fits everything needed for middle school. The style is current and the backpack has a clean cut feel. The quality is great- I anticipate it will last for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Great bag...Caution on the red lining
customer_reviews.text: I really do love this backpack -- I use it mostly as a sports mom bag to pack all the things we need for my sons' tournaments/games. I really like the velcro closure and fold over buckle. Makes getting in and out of the bag easy. Word of caution on the silver bag...it has a red lining that if it gets wet will bleed through the silver exterior. It set in as large pink stain, which I cannot get clean. I ended up ordering a second one of these in the dark gray as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: hawkeyemom

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bag!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use as a gym bag, and now I use it all the time. Holds a lot and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: cart11UM

customer_reviews.title: Some people say it looks a bit like a weekender when I have it all packed but ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits everything! I can bring my gym stuff, books for school, and pack my lunch all in the same bag. Some people say it looks a bit like a weekender when I have it all packed but its better than walking around like a bag lady with lunch and gym bag and backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda S.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Velcro gave out in less than a month of use
customer_reviews.author: JACOB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome awesome backpack
customer_reviews.text: Awesome awesome backpack. My friends are always saying how they want to steal it from me. It's a great size and fits all I need for the gym rat life I lead.
customer_reviews.author: klcruz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome backpack. Plenty of storage, looks baller... the only thing for me is that when I use it for school, it barely fits in my locker but its do-able. Aside from that, everything is dope... just because it opens like a flap though, ig you are a smaller person it might look a little big on you
customer_reviews.author: Mit

customer_reviews.title: A great gym bag
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was a little bit larger but I am able to fit all my gym equipment inside it. (Putting my size 13 shoes in the container in the bottom is even possible!) I wish it had a separate sealed pocket or container for my dirty clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Starscream

customer_reviews.title: Great for those on the go!
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift for Christmas and am very impressed with its size and comfort. I am on the road a lot as a musician, so I can pack away a few days worth of clothes, my MacBook, other accessories and it fits my size 13 shoes in the bottom, if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this backpack. I use it to go to the gym and then bike to work and also pack lunch and usually some books/work materials for the day. I love that it has a separate shoe compartment too and it looks good!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Goldkamp

customer_reviews.title: It’s a keeper
customer_reviews.text: My husband love this bag. He uses it to go out of town for gulf and brags about how much stuff he can put in it .
customer_reviews.author: T. Claiborne

customer_reviews.title: Not just a "golf" bag
customer_reviews.text: Really strong quality with the heavy load I out in it. Supportive and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Lieu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome bag...But was somewhat large for my frame (5'4) Anyone over 5'8 needs to have this bag!!! It's awesome looking. Perfect gym bag!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SPACIOUS, DURABLE, and STYLISH
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to transport my 13' in. Macbook throughout my commutes and it's perfect.. Even has enough room to keep my laptop in its targus grid slipcase on, the more protection for my laptop the merrier lol definitely recommend this bag... So spacious and durable! Only down side is if you have nothing on the "shoe compartment" then it pretty much just slops down
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great for school!
customer_reviews.text: Half way through the semester and it is still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A. Lubbock

customer_reviews.title: Large enough for all your stuff.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great for holding my work stuff and my gym stuff together plus a lunch and a towel. It's really big but I really enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the right bag
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bag that can hold my gym clothes, shoes, lunch and my laptop comfortably. After trying two different ones. I finally found it!
customer_reviews.author: Dion Turner

customer_reviews.title: Could Use More Interior Room
customer_reviews.text: Material quality seems sturdy and backpack is overall well-fashioned. However, I expected more interior room. It was tough to store my lifting belt and other training accessories along with gym shoes, but not impossible. All in all, a good backpack, but temper your expectations concerning storage.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky C.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Great bag... awesome looking right out the box. Great alternative to common gym bags.
customer_reviews.author: RDT

customer_reviews.title: Love the bag
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag, but it is small. Wanted it as a carry on for flying, but it packs awkward and does not fit much
customer_reviews.author: onawhim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gym Bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Gym baglove it, has room on the bottom for my wet shirts and lots of room inside for the gym gear, and it looks great!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. Lots of room
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Lots of room. I plan to use it to commute to work while I ride a bike. It's big enough for my laptop, shoes, and change of clothes. I bought a separate chest strap so the bag stays secure while riding a bike. It also is nicely designed and looks good enough to bring into the office.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna325

customer_reviews.title: For your modern/city boy.
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful - combining modern and sporty style with a durable finish. I constantly get compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Darren Langston

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Best bag/backpack I've ever purchased. Plenty of room, a separate compartment for shoes, and it gets lots of compliments. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size. Lasted throughout the year and my boys ...
customer_reviews.text: Great size. Lasted throughout the year and my boys are hard on their bookbags.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: This is the best backpack of all time
customer_reviews.text: This is the best backpack of all time. It fits so much in it. I love the separate compartment for shoes-- perfect for my running shoes. I travelled for the weekend and was able to fit everything I needed (including a bike helmet) inside. And the bonus was that the bag is still compact enough to be a carry on.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Freeman

customer_reviews.title: I was bummed the top compartment was not kept separate ...
customer_reviews.text: I was bummed the top compartment was not kept separate from the bottom. Anything you put in the top will smoosh whatever you put in the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: This is a really great bag. It’s just larger than expected so I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great bag. It’s just larger than expected so I returned it. Quality and style were no problem..
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A. Twogood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, lots of space, and very stylish. Perfect size for any use. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sheraiah P. Lucena

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I can fill it to the top ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I can fill it to the top and it's still light weight.
customer_reviews.author: C.Has

customer_reviews.title: Made my freshman happy!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she absolutely loves it! Fits her rather larger binder books and laptop with room to spare. "Her favorite backpack ever" Bonus she has gotten a ton of compliments and where did you get thats!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for basketball
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for basketball. My son loves it and he gets lots of compliments because it is not the same old black bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it but the bottom has already started to strip and school started in September
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bag and durability. I bought this for my son in high school and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: A670

customer_reviews.title: Big but solid.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty huge, but my middle schooler digs it. Works well if he needs to take it to basketball camps too...
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany in PDX

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, alittle small
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack which is why I am giving 5 stars but I want to be honest that it's not at big as I thought it would be. To put it in perspective I can't put a pair of shoes side by side in it. Lol (using as a gym bag) other then that it's a great design plenty of depth and lots of little hidden pockets
customer_reviews.author: Surenity

customer_reviews.title: Really like this bag a lot
customer_reviews.text: Really like this bag a lot!! Can be a bit awkward getting shoes in but I'm getting used to the bag. All my things are organized when I take this bag to the gym and bag is light when transporting items. Very glad I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Champen

customer_reviews.title: was a very nice backpack.
customer_reviews.text: was a very nice backpack... so nice that during the first week of school, it was stolen. I'm not bitter...
customer_reviews.author: fujimac187

customer_reviews.title: Really large bag!
customer_reviews.text: Material is decent and it feels sturdy but be forewarned that this bag is HUGE. It looks okay when it's filled with stuff, such as in the stock photo that we see on this website, but you'll need a lot of stuff before it starts to look less like a rectangle and more like a normal bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack.  Read the reviews before you decide.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My wife and son have tried to steal it. All my coworkers really like the design. People were coming up to my desk touching it. I really like it. I knew what I was getting into. The other reviews are correct by saying there could be more pockets but if you know this ahead of time and that is a concern then don't get it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality backpack, however it's a lot larger than I had thought.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Garabage
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely garbage. The zippers broke and the large opening doesn’t stay closed. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a VERY roomy top load backpack!! Lightweight too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered the light grey but its way darker than presented more like the deep gray
customer_reviews.text: Was way bigger than expected but its feel durable and is very cute. It prevents my son from taking two bags to school as it has a slot for his shoes underneath. Ordered the light grey but its way darker than presented more like the deep gray. I'm cool with it tho
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for school. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Nguyen425

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! fits all that i need
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! fits all that i need. i don't mind the mouth open. it's also comfortable with padding to support your back. i recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works and looks great and fits all my son's stuff easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda C

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for carrying day to day items and more
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for carrying day to day items and more. I needed more space in my backpack for my daily commute and this definitely had the extra space I needed
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: The backpack is stylish I've got many compliments on it ...
customer_reviews.text: The backpack is stylish I've got many compliments on it, but the bottom pocket is rather small. I still need to carry a gym back with me along with my school books.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron T.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Holds a surprising amount of stuff. I used it as a gym bag. Plenty of room for shoes. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the quality of this backpack. lots of room for my gym/work stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. However
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. However, definitely specific to the gym. Don't expect to get great use out of it for an everyday school bag or something of that nature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size. The bottom actually fits his size 14 ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband to use as a gym bag. Perfect size. The bottom actually fits his size 14 Nikes.
customer_reviews.author: andi013

customer_reviews.title: Its a really good bag, fits a lot in and very stylish
customer_reviews.text: Its a really good bag, fits a lot in and very stylish. The only con for me is that I've only had it a month and the (rubber) on the bottom edges of the bag have started to peel.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag!! Got it for my husband and he uses it as gym bag. It fits so much in there.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: This is the best backpack I have in terms of daily use
customer_reviews.text: This is the best backpack I have in terms of daily use! I love the show storage at the bottom. Multiple pockets, large storage area. Very comfortable to wear, perfect as a carry on bag when traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: I love my bag. I used it to travel two weeks last summer. Great quality and had enough room for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little gym bag to fit all my stuff in.
customer_reviews.author: Phong

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: The bag fits expectations, but the stitching is already coming undone and I have only had it for 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoe compartment and inner part share space
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than expected but perfect. Has a lot of room
customer_reviews.author: Ayanna General

customer_reviews.title: Bag for both looks and function
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, incredible convenient. The roll top is very useful and even stuffed to the max the velcro is strong enough to stay closed. The bottom zipper compartment is large and offers an unexpected amount of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this backpack. This will be used as my personal item for flights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVED IT
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is amazing! It was had many pockets and I was able to fit all of my big school binders into it.

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack!!
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack I use it every day. Its a little bit bigger than I was expecting, but still great.

customer_reviews.title: Very worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious, looks the same as advertised, large than expected, comfortable as well. I have no complaints about it at all

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Best backpack ever. Great material. Stays clean. Perfect amount of space/pockets.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag, although it was bigger than what I ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bag, although it was bigger than what I expected. I had imagined in my head something smaller. But still very nice, with many pockets. More of a Hiking Bag, than a Gym Bag. But could use on many different occasions.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your $
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is poor quality. Already falling apart...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love all of the compartments - works perfectly for the gym

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item as described no issues with transaction would definitely recommend this seller and product.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was awesome until the zipper broke. Trying to haggle a repair now...

customer_reviews.title: Best School Bag Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, my son loves it. He was wanting a bag that had a large copacitty and this one sure does.
customer_reviews.author: richard johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great all in one bag. Work and play all in one.
customer_reviews.author: Boxer2249

customer_reviews.title: Standard
customer_reviews.text: The backpack arrived on time, intact, and perfectly ready to use. Does not keep square shape though, unless full.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No frills everyday bag
customer_reviews.text: Large main compartment. There is a pocket for a laptop or tablet. Water bottle holder will fit my larger hydroflask bottles, the 32 and 40 oz size. The small pocket has a key ring and can hold any smaller items you need to hold. I use it for my workout earbuds and iPod. The bottom the main compartment can go into the shoe storage compartment if you aren't carrying shoes to make it a larger compartment. The shoe pocket on the bottom is a great idea. My shoes barely fit and I'm only a size 10. Anything bigger may not fit. Good everyday bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, lots of space for shoes, clothes and lunch, looks stylish too
customer_reviews.author: Joel Tham

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Lot of space good separation, Laptop pocket, nice design and high quality. What else do you need?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Even better than I expected. It easily fits ALL my gym items (including my makeup bag and lunch), with room for more. Looking forward to also using this for quick trips and not checking my luggage. The construction is great and the style is perfect. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: ELopez

customer_reviews.title: An amazing backpack. Well designed
customer_reviews.text: An amazing backpack. Well designed, strong materials, and an absolutely great solution for any student athlete. My son particularly loves the fact he can separate his track stuff from his books! Highly recommend for any high school student or athletic person looking for a strong bag with modern design looks.
customer_reviews.author: Chakris K.

customer_reviews.title: Great gym bag or weekender bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend for his birthday to use as a gym bag. He works out twice a day. Can fit all his shoes (work shoes), a large jiujitsu gi, clothes some gym things, and then some. He also has been using it for weekend trips and seems to love the style and it's the first gift that I've gotten him that he uses frequently! It also looks sleek enough to bring into his workplace.
customer_reviews.author: Mil Rose

customer_reviews.title: The only thing is that it feels like more of a chute and it doesn't really give ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely getting compliments on it. The only thing is that it feels like more of a chute and it doesn't really give you the ability to organize clothes inside of it. The shoe compartment is awesome, and I use it everyday. I definitely feel like it was a good purchase, but the lack of internal compartments within the main opening (purely to organize clothes) made me rate it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for a good friend and he is 6'4" and it fits him ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a good friend and he is 6'4" and it fits him well and he can put work clothes and shoes in the bag a the gym. Very good buy and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Shaela129

customer_reviews.title: great size would have been better if it had some ...
customer_reviews.text: durable, great size would have been better if it had some little pockets in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loved loved loved it! I'll buy again soon 😉
customer_reviews.author: Maldita

product_meta.title: Nike Sport III Golf Backpack
product_meta.description: The Nike Golf Sport Backpack features a fold-over top with buckle closure and multiple accessory pockets to keep your gear secure and organized when you're on the move. A zip shoe compartment stores your footwear separate from your other items. Dimensions: 13" W x 27" H x 7" D
feature_bullets: Fold-over top and buckle closure offers secure storage.
Zippered shoe compartment separates footwear from other items.
Large main compartment along with multiple accessory pockets inside helps keep items organized and a mesh side pocket offers breathable storage
Polyester material is lightweight and durable.
